conditions: Start your Sunday off with some morning sunshine and a dose of Rendezvous Mountain's finest. Look for mostly sunny skies today with periods of sporadic cloud cover moving through the valley.  Calm to light winds will be trending out of the SW at 15-17 MPH with ridgetop gusts reaching up to 26 MPH. Mountain temperatures will start off cold and rise into the low 20's in the higher elevations while the base area on the valley floor will hit the low 40's by mid-afternoon. Cold overnight temps will keep the ski conditions fast and chalky up high while the mid-mountain terrain will soften up by early afternoon. Now that the King's and Queen's have shown us what's possible, come practice your craft on our high mountain playground! Stay safe. -MB
